Like designing web page?! Like to play with CSS and 
HTML?! This is about the web-designing event 
 
of Avenir 2015. It will consist of 2 rounds , 
 
? A prelims round, and 
 
? A final round. 
 
Rules and Regulations: 
 
Team Size : 
 
Maximum 2. 
 
Prelims 
 
?There will be a 30 minutes test, having 30 Objective type 
 
questions testing the basic HTML and CSS 
 
skills of the participants. 
 
?The teams scoring above a certain cut-off will advance to 
 
the Finals. 
 
Final 
 
?All the teams will be given a simple HTML/CSS template, 
 
a set of instructions and the basic resources required for 
 
designing a web page. Their task is to modify the given 
 
template as per the given problem statement, and show 
 
their own creativity as well, if possible. 
 
? Extra features carry additional credits. 
 
?Time provided to complete the task is 3 hours.The team 
 
which takes the minimum time to fulfill do their job wins. 
 
?The teams are not allowed to bring any CSS code of their 
 
own, they have to use from the CSS codes, that we will 
 
provide, and modify them. 
 
?Hardcopy resources can be used for help, no softcopies 
 
allowed, and also no online help will be provided. 
 
?The decision of the judges will be final and undisputable. 
 
? (Additional software like notepad++ or Dreamweaver 
 
will be provided)
